sqlMap.statement: ( SELECT EZUPTIME, MSTR_ATT_DATA_PK, MSTR_BIZ_ID, MSTR_ATT_DATA_GRP_TXT, MSTR_ATT_DATA_NM, MSTR_ACTV_CD, MSTR_ATT_DATA_BLOD, MSTR_ATT_DATA_VOL, MSTR_ATT_DATA_DESC_TXT FROM MSTR_ATT_DATA WHERE EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MSTR_BIZ_ID = #amal4000# AND MSTR_ATT_DATA_GRP_TXT LIKE #attDataGrpTxtNMAL4000# AND CMPY_PK = #cmpyPk# AND PTY_LOC_PK = #ptyLocPk# ) UNION ALL ( SELECT EZUPTIME, MSTR_ATT_DATA_PK, MSTR_BIZ_ID, MSTR_ATT_DATA_GRP_TXT, MSTR_ATT_DATA_NM, MSTR_ACTV_CD, MSTR_ATT_DATA_BLOD, MSTR_ATT_DATA_VOL, MSTR_ATT_DATA_DESC_TXT FROM MSTR_ATT_DATA WHERE EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND MSTR_BIZ_ID = #amal4750# AND MSTR_ATT_DATA_GRP_TXT LIKE #attDataGrpTxtNMAL4750# AND CMPY_PK = #cmpyPk# AND PTY_LOC_PK = #ptyLocPk# ) ORDER BY EZUPTIME DESC
